fileSamples.statement: Gppo ⨾ ⦗D⦘ ⊆ ⦗D⦘ ⨾ ⊤₂.
fileSamples.proofString:
unfold ppo.
arewrite_id ⦗R⦘.
rels.
rewrite path_ut_first.
rewrite !seqA.
arewrite (Gsb ⨾ (Gdata ∪ Gctrl ∪ Gaddr ⨾ Gsb^? ∪ Grfi ∪ Grmw        ∪ Grmw_dep ⨾ Gsb^? ∪ ⦗GR_ex⦘ ⨾ Gsb)＊ ⊆ Gsb).
arewrite_id ⦗GR_ex⦘.
rewrite (data_in_sb WF), (addr_in_sb WF), (ctrl_in_sb WF).
rewrite (rmw_dep_in_sb WF), (rmw_in_sb WF).
arewrite (Grfi ⊆ Gsb).
generalize (@sb_trans G); ins; relsf.
relsf; unionL.
arewrite_id ⦗W⦘.
rels.
rewrite (dom_rel_helper dom_ppo_D_helper).
basic_solver.
rewrite !seqA.
rewrite (dom_rel_helper dom_R_ex_sb_D).
rewrite rtE; relsf.
seq_rewrite (dom_rel_helper dom_ppo_D_helper).
basic_solver 12.
